item.description:
Here's an event for the Dartmouth NH region.

Let's meetup tonight and get some supper.

Molly's Restaurant and Bar is locally famous as a great gathering place and family restaurant popular with Dartmouth students and locals alike.

Located in the heart of Hanover, Molly's has become a Dartmouth College tradition.

Directions:

Traveling North on I-91
Vermont Exit 13
At the bottom of the ramp turn right and cross the Ledyard Bridge into New Hampshire.
(Would you believe this is on the Appalachian trail! Look for the blazes on the telephone poles!)
At the top of the hill, turn right onto Main Street.
Molly's is located at 43 S. Main Street (on the right hand side).
You will find parking along Main Street in Hanover, in the parking garage on
Lebanon Street, or in the public parking lots behind Molly's.


Family and friends welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the one with the Meetup sign in the Lobby
item.why: We like to get together and have fun! It's great to Meetup off the trail...which is melting right now.
item.name: Meetup at Molly's Restaurant and Bar in Hanover, NH
